html:
10.4.23  1:02 pm   have you ever covered the abbey road medley

      no

10.4.23  11:59 am   When you create a thing and you know what you want it to be like but nothing comes up, how do you suppress the urge to bang your head against a wall

      sometimes i sing a little tune "i hate myself" which, for reference, can also be heard on this website and also elsewhere on the internet

10.4.23  11:12 am   thoughts on the number 27?

      3x3x3

10.4.23  10:59 am   how do you cope with existing?

      exist a little more

10.4.23  10:36 am   why are you up at such a reasonable time

      every time is reasonable. just do the math

10.4.23  10:20 am   Do you sometimes plan the structure of a song in advance? I'm torn between free-form-writing as it comes and the clarity that comes with a fixed form. (And also it's much easier to work towards "let's do an AABA tune".)

      it's mostly impossible to know exactly what the form will need until you start writing it, however, the song will offer you clues. sometimes the initial idea will very clearly be a 'chorus', and sometimes you get a clear picture of what it will need. other times, the first idea will be like the title at the beginning of the A of AABA. it's really all about taking the initial idea and 'diagnosing it', with the most important question simply being 'is this the beginning or not the beginning'

10.4.23  10:05 am   one of the grad posters at my school has a quote written on it: "you can't just go gay, it's not like buying a ladder"
this sounds like something you would say, am i correct?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.4.23  9:20 am   how are you today, bill?

      pretty good

10.4.23  9:10 am   Are you up for a music chat

      sure

10.4.23  8:57 am   have you even been really silly

      no

10.4.23  6:58 am   Just want to say "the origins of chickens" is one of my favorite videos of all time and I use it in every social context with that dumb ass debate

      oh good, that's what it's there for

10.4.23  6:20 am   should i work while having lunch

      sure

10.4.23  6:02 am   hi Bill! how are you?

      pretty good

10.4.23  4:05 am   what is life?

      it can be literally anything. it may actually be the only thing that can be anything

10.4.23  2:55 am   Hello Bill Wurtz on Bill Wurtz Dot Com. Thank you very much for the music. I hope it brings you as much joy to make it as it does for me to listen to it (which is a lot)! As a creative, would you recommend pursing a career in a creative job (screenwriting) even though statistically I will likely not find serious work? I have stories I'm very proud of and I want to tell but sometimes I worry it's just a pipe dream, and I ought to wisen up. (Unfortunately I'm not related to anyone currently in the film industry). Thank you. 

      if you have stories, you should go ahead and tell them. this does not necessarily mean doing something as formal as what you described in your statistical analysis. and, in fact, if you tell your own stories, statistically, that's gonna work. you're gonna be able to do it. the statistical unlikelihood you described earlier had more to do with job-searching in a collaborative industry, and much less to do with telling stories, especially your own

10.4.23  2:55 am   what is the ideal species of fish?

      idealfish

10.4.23  1:56 am   Do you think ears are a part of the face?

      yes

10.4.23  1:09 am   do you like saxophones (particularly baritone sax)

      they're kind of boring unless someone plays it

10.4.23  12:48 am   Should I stop eating sponges

      yes

10.4.23  12:19 am   have more people been to canada than you have?

      yes

10.3.23  11:59 pm   What is your opinion on grilled cheese?

      too predictable

10.3.23  11:42 pm   will you ever release an album?

      maybe something better

10.3.23  9:59 pm   what is a question?

      i have no idea

10.3.23  8:33 pm   After 4/4, 2/2, 6/8, and 3/4, what's the time signature you use most?

      12/8

10.3.23  8:29 pm   if you were to eat 37 grapefruits at once, how many anaphylactic reactions would you have (assuming you are very allergic to grapefruits)

      thank you for this question

10.3.23  7:36 pm   some people really like candy corn (I am one of those people).
some people hate candy corn with the heated passion of a thousand blazing suns.
what's your opinion on candy corn?

      it looks cool, but i couldn't imagine eating it

10.3.23  7:04 pm   What makes music a song?

      if it's singable then it's a song. that's my general rule

10.3.23  5:49 pm   THEY ARE COMING!! HIDE QUICK!!! Or are they?

      no

10.3.23  5:48 pm   Do you use 9/18 on your songs?

      time signatures can't have 18 on the bottom .... unless you can figure out what an 18th note is. however, 9/18 would be the equivalent of 2/4, which certainly is used, probably most often for just 1 bar, to transition between sections

10.3.23  5:38 pm   Have you ever put a lime in a coconut?

      no

10.3.23  5:20 pm   can you colonize the whole entire world

      no

10.3.23  5:16 pm   do Lightning McQueen have a car insurance or life insurance

      neither. he is uninsured

10.3.23  4:32 pm   do you think toe socks were created by people trying to make a viral sensation

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.3.23  4:03 pm   What kind of things do you do to get yourself out of a rut or a groggy mood and get back on the happy horse?

      take a walk. also you need to have a map, and know the location of the horse

10.3.23  3:57 pm   how real can something even get? does it overflow at some point and become unreal or does it just become infinitely more real? what's even the point where something crosses the line between real and fiction?

     it's like a sine wave

10.3.23  3:28 pm   do you like goth girls

      sure, but i also like non-goth girls, goth non-girls, non-goth non-girls, and so forth

10.3.23  2:06 pm   how much spook do you have in you

      all of it. it's not a pleasant feeling

10.3.23  1:53 pm   how do you make your videos?

      do everything, or maybe just some of it

10.3.23  1:41 pm   what is the purpose of life?

      to do everything, or maybe just some of it

10.3.23  12:40 pm   im feeling randy

      i understand

10.3.23  12:17 pm   is this a real questions page if it is put jjjjdjss , , sa a a a 

      yes, it is actually now slightly more real because of that

10.3.23  11:05 am   do chairs exist?

      i need to check with Neil Degrasse Tyson

10.3.23  8:58 am   Hi bill i've been watching you since I was young How write songs

      no one knows how to write songs. if you figure it out, you will be the first

10.3.23  5:56 am   how many songs of yours use irregular time signatures?

      i would estimate that about 50% of my songs go into an irregular time signature for at least 1 bar. the vast majority of these instances, i suspect, are indeed only 1 bar long

10.3.23  3:09 am   is it better to do like one thing really really well, at the cost of everything else? or try to do a bunch of things pretty good and have a more balanced life?

      both ways are viable

10.3.23  2:47 am   i kinda want a grilled cheese... but i also dont want a grilled cheese... this is a peculiar dilemma i have ended up in. could you maybe help me solve it? i can't seem to solve it myself

      have half a grilled cheese, and then half of something else that's not a grilled cheese

10.3.23  2:14 am   bill, do you have a word or phrase that you like to use or find yourself using a lot in everyday life?

      "ok"

10.3.23  12:38 am   thoughts on trombone?

      hard to read while playing it

10.2.23  11:38 pm   What is a person

      it's you

      yes
